### Explanation
The price for different airlines follows a similar pattern, here if budget is priority, mix outbound and return airlines as this will save you lots of money!
The price increases at start of June and again at the beginning of July. 
Make sure to shop around, as airlines such as ITA airways may offer extreme prices. 
If your priority is flexibility British Airways is the airline to chose.
